subject: [Radiance-general]  rpict,	rtrace start up time and number ofsources
body:
This reduced the start-up time from several hours to 15 seconds... still
I have not seen the results of the rendering ;-)

Did you check what happens if you have your 1800 sources in a large scene?

CU Lars.
